name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of December 26, Dong'an Village 2, Xuhui District, Shanghai

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Ministry of State Security has warned people to be careful of "The Bourne Supremacy" foreign spies in the comment section who will steal our country's state secrets through the social media comment section.
December 24, Guangdong. A man reported to the national security agency that there was a spy in the comment section: Someone said in the comment section that he worked 12 hours a day, which is slandering the image of our country. (According to the Labor Law) We all work eight hours a day, how can we work 12 hours, so he is a spy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 26, Changsha, Hunan. Actress Xu Jiao said that she met a smoking man in a restaurant in Changsha, so she advised him not to smoke in the restaurant.
The man shouted "There is no no-smoking sign here." When Xu Jiao was recording evidence, the man snatched Xu Jiao's mobile phone and threw the cigarette butt into Xu Jiao's bowl.
Afterwards, Xu Jiao posted a message saying: The police came and said that smoking indoors in Changsha is not illegal and cannot be fined.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 26, Zhengzhou, Henan. An elderly man with limited mobility walked into the petition office with a cane, and the security guard urged him to "go inside first". Netizens responded, "Which country is this?" "The country will take action"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 22, Yangtian Village, Xinlong Town, Huangpu District, Guangzhou City, had money to hold a marathon, but no money to pay for temporary resettlement of villagers, causing villagers to be homeless and without money to eat, forcing primary school students to come out and hold signs to defend their rights
Video 1: A woman was knocked down by the police. The police denied that they did it, but the onlookers accused the police of beating people
Video 2: The police snatched the A4 paper used by the villagers to defend their rights. The villagers questioned whether the A4 paper was private property and whether the police illegally snatched the private property of citizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens reported that in the Memorial Hall of Anti-Japanese Aviation Martyrs in Nanjing, the fuselage of an air force fighter plane from World War II was changed from the original Republic of China's blue sky and white sun flag paint to the Soviet Union's red star paint.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Every month, 20 to 30 middle school students visit the psychiatric department of a county in North China, most of whom are tired of studying.
And those who are still in school get up around 5 o'clock and spend more than 17 hours in school every day. They only have one day off every two or three weeks or even a month. Some of them often break down and cry because of the pressure of studying. Parents and teachers also have emotional problems of varying degrees in this long learning race.
But in the face of reality, no one can stop...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 27, Yonhap News Agency reported: South Korea's National Intelligence Service confirmed that the Ukrainian military captured a wounded North Korean soldier. This is the first North Korean soldier captured in the war of Russian invasion of Ukraine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the recent boycott of Christmas, some careful netizens discovered that the New Year's Day is also a Western festival, which originated from the Gregorian calendar, which is also called the Christian era.
The orthodox New Year's Day in China should be the first day of the first lunar month. Even during the Republic of China period, January 1 of the Gregorian calendar was not called New Year's Day, but "New Year".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
December 24, Kunming City, Yunnan Province, Urban Management began to confiscate roadside electric vehicles

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 26 (Release), Zhumadian, Henan. The Donghu No. 1 North District project developed by Chengtou Real Estate has been unfinished for five years and has not yet been delivered. 
The owners put up a banner in the courtyard of the county party committee to protect their rights. The banner read "Believe in the government, believe in the party, believe that the government will give us justice"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 27, Shanxi. A promotional poster displayed in a Wanda Plaza: "Work overtime all night and feel refreshed"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 27 (Released) Shijiazhuang, Hebei. The Yuhuangding Temple actually enshrines a portrait of Mao Zedong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, Mao Ning responded that China is considering resuming imports of Japanese aquatic products in the first half of 2025. Mao Ning pointed out that China will effectively participate in long-term international monitoring and independent sampling and other monitoring activities, and will adjust relevant measures based on scientific evidence to gradually resume imports of Japanese aquatic products that meet the standards. China's position against the discharge of Fukushima nuclear contaminated water into the sea has not changed. In the comment section of the video, netizens mocked

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 26, Beijing News reported: Two county party secretaries in Longhui, Hunan, accepted bribes and allowed unscrupulous merchants to mix inferior rice into students’ nutritious meals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
South Korea's Acting President Han Deok-soo was also impeached! The National Assembly voted to pass.
Today, the South Korean National Assembly voted to pass the impeachment motion against Acting President Han Deok-soo. 192 members of the National Assembly participated in the vote and passed the impeachment motion with 192 votes in favor.
This is the first time in South Korean history that the National Assembly impeached the president and the acting president two weeks apart.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
On December 26, the police at the entrance of Wanda Plaza in Linping, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, enforced the law violently, dragged the person who called the police, and the woman and the child were dragged and injured, which caused dissatisfaction among the onlookers. Some onlookers came forward to argue with the police
The cause was that the father of the family involved was doing renovation work at Wanda and died accidentally at work, and then his wife called the police. The police came and dragged the child and mother of the family to the ground and injured them. 120 even came
The police involved was still laughing after dragging

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the first-instance verdict of the murder of Henan female judge Wang Jiajia was announced, and the defendant Dang Zhijun was sentenced to death.
The video reported by People's Daily was flooded with comments such as "Goodbye, hero", "Goodbye all the way", and "Mr. Righteousness".
Earlier media reports said that Dang Zhijun was injured in a car accident and was dissatisfied with the compensation of more than 9,000 yuan, so he killed Judge Wang Jiajia. The news on the Internet said that the insurance company was willing to pay 12,000 yuan, but Judge Wang Jiajia was finally sentenced to pay 9,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman from Yilan County, Liaoning Province, reported in her real name that she sued the defendant Xu Wen in court. In 2018, Xu Wen and 10 other people took her to the National Defense Hospital and Shenbei Anning Hospital's psychiatric hospital for forced hospitalization. She was diagnosed with "temporary mental disorder" in the hospital. In June 2023, the woman was violently taken away from the town government by the police station director and beaten, causing injuries. No one cared about the 10,000 yuan medical expenses. The hotel in the town involved was also warned not to receive the woman.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
Hot search on Weibo on December 26: [#A food safety officer will never give in in 8 days#]
The cause was that a newly employed food safety officer at Guangzhou University was fired for reporting food safety issues. Some netizens found that the fired food safety officer had reported to the 12345 mayor hotline, but only received a perfunctory reply that the matter had been resolved. In the end, the only way to solve the problem was to post it on Xiaohongshu and become popular.
Now the case of the food safety officer has been promoted by CCTV as a positive example

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Donghu No. 1 North District project developed by Chengtou Real Estate in Xincai County, Zhumadian City, Henan Province, has not been delivered for five and a half years. The owners went to the county party committee compound and the roof of the unfinished building to hang banners to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhuhai has completely banned electric bikes. If you ride an electric bike into Zhuhai, your vehicle will be detained and you will be fined 2,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of December 25, a forest fire broke out near the University Town in Shishan Town, Nanhai District, Foshan City, Guangdong Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the People's Daily published an article: "Sino-US Friendly Cooperation Stories" Works Collection Activity has been launched.
In response, Lei Ge, a "positive energy" blogger in Canada, said: Chinese media always likes to be wishful thinking, and they are "a bunch of traitors"
Netizens replied, "Cutting off someone's financial resources is like killing their parents, and they still rely on positive energy to make a living"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwanese media reported that Chinese netizens have been posting tutorials on Xiaohongshu, teaching people how to forge school certificates through photoshopped pictures in an attempt to obtain Taiwan's tourist entry permit through a third country.
According to statistics from the Mainland Affairs Council, as of November 30 this year, a total of 134,000 Chinese applied to come to Taiwan from a third country, and the actual number of people entering the country was 98,000. The Immigration Agency has seized 124 applications suspected of forged documents and rejected them.
The Immigration Agency said: The prevention mechanism has been fully activated

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The electrical engineering major of a 985 university in China has listed "Xi Jinping Thought" as a core course.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 27, the Dujiangyan police reported: "The two people repeatedly fabricated and spread false information that the giant pandas "Mei Xiang" and "Tian Li" were abused, and made a profit of more than 170,000 yuan. They have been transferred to the procuratorate for prosecution."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 26, Hefei, Anhui. A woman posted a video saying that the Lexus hybrid car she bought last year suddenly caught fire in October this year, and the 4S store immediately removed the wheels and the car logo on the trunk, and shifted the responsibility to the owner.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 27, economic expert Yang Delong said: Next year, domestic policies will be further strengthened, and the economic environment next year will be significantly better than this year, which caused ridicule from netizens.
Netizens said: "It's always next year"
"This year is the best year in the future"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 26, anti-trafficking volunteer "Shangguan Zhengyi" said that in 1995, Tian Jing, a woman under the age of 16, was sold from Guizhou to Datong, Shanxi by her cousin. Tian Jing was beaten many times by her "husband" and family members. After her "husband" forced her to have sex with him, she gave birth to a son.
Later, Tian Jing found an opportunity to escape and called the police. After the police filed a case, they have not been able to find her cousin. In 2022, her cousin appeared in Guizhou, but the police believed that the case had passed the prosecution period and withdrew the case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 25, Shangqiu, Henan. Owners of Heyue Lakeside Community gathered in front of the local petition office to defend their rights.
November 22 (released), Qinzhou, Guangxi. Owners of Jinyuan International City in Lingshan County demanded their property certificates. It is reported that the banners hung on the owners' balconies were also violently torn down by people who came to their homes.
December 25, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The demolition and reconstruction of Fengxia Village is on the verge of being left unfinished, and the villagers are demanding the overdue temporary relocation fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 27, netizens said that a Chinese version of the "Drone Escape Guide" appeared in a hotel in Moscow that hosted Chinese people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 26, Jilin. The woman said that community staff called her repeatedly to remind her not to forget to pay for medical insurance. The community said that it was arranged by the superiors.
The woman said that they never called her every year, so why did they call her frequently this year to urge her to pay for medical insurance.
A netizen said in the comment area, "If you don't pay, they will call your parents."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 27, the Zhuhai Intermediate People's Court sentenced the defendant Fan Weiqiu to death for endangering public safety by dangerous means in a case of 35 deaths caused by a car crash in Zhuhai.
After trial, it was found that Fan Weiqiu was dissatisfied with the result of the divorce property division because of the breakdown of his marriage, frustration in life, and decided to vent his anger by driving into the crowd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 26, Hubei Enshi. A student from Hubei University for Nationalities self-immolated on campus.
The student who exposed the incident said that the school blocked the news afterwards, "hiding the body. The parents only learned about it a week later. They rushed to the school but were stopped by the security guards outside the school gate. Then they were taken away by the security guards and the police in a police car."
The student who exposed the incident also revealed that the school currently does not allow teachers and students to discuss the matter. If any student discusses it, the teacher will warn him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, in Huanggang, Hubei, several puppies were found with their eyes gouged out at a construction site. The video showed that the puppies were missing their eyeballs, bloodied and groaning in pain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A memorial was set up at Baku Airport to commemorate the heroically killed crew members of the Azerbaijan Airlines passenger plane.
Euronews reported on December 26 that an Azerbaijani government source exclusively confirmed to the station on Thursday that a Russian surface-to-air missile caused an Azerbaijan Airlines plane to crash near Aktau, Kazakhstan on Wednesday, killing 38 passengers. There were 62 passengers and 5 crew members on board.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The employees of Goldsmiths stated that "the Brazilian Ministry of Labor rescued 163 slave workers at BYD construction sites" and that the news was untrue.
Currently, the Ministry of Labor wants to force Goldsmiths to terminate the contracts with its employees and repatriate them. We love Goldsmiths, cherish this job, and are willing to stay in Brazil.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the local sales failed, the local government set its sights on the sky.
Recently, Hunan Low-Altitude Economy Company was established with a registered capital of 2 billion yuan.
Netizens responded, "Finally, they started charging for the sky. Next, they will charge for the sun."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After being detained for more than 100 days on suspicion of corruption, Taiwan People's Party Chairman Ko Wen-je was granted bail of NT$30 million on the 27th. Many of Ko Wen-je's supporters gathered outside the Taipei District Court. Ko Wen-je choked up when speaking to the media and thanked his supporters, emphasizing that he believed he was not a corrupt person who profited from corruption. He posted on social media for the first time after his release, and began by calling out to his supporter "Xiao Cao": "Thank you for waiting for four months and not leaving." He also said that he would go home to be with his family, fulfill his filial piety, and wait for the truth to be revealed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A documentary with positive energy and the main theme "Prosperity as Wish" was released on December 23, but the box office data was terrible.
Maoyan data shows that as of now, the cumulative box office of the documentary is only 714 yuan, with a total of 13 viewers, and a total box office of 70 yuan on Christmas Eve and Christmas.
It is reported that the film tells the struggle stories of six young people, allowing the audience to feel the magnificent development process of the motherland.
